posts.message:
Amazing CQRS + Event Sourcing ( DDD tutorial)
It is not a framework but it will help to understand CQRS + Event Sourcing
posts.caption: www.cqrs.nu
posts.description: The ideas around CQRS are fascinating, but different enough from the way we do conventional development that some questions come up again and again. This page collect a number of such questions that we've encountered, and attempts to give accurate and satisfactory answers to them.

posts.message: i have web app that make request to data base each 5 seconds to get the last updated data from DB i am using AJAX request with interval each 5 seconds  ,  if there is  another way to make this   ?

Jodod Technology Labs is looking for a skilled development team lead in Mansoura, Egypt. They will lead a highly competent team and will be responsible of delivering high quality software and meeting hard deadlines. They will also be responsible of critical technical decisions, maintaining the team harmony and skills diversity and orchestrating daily work between different team members. Jodod Technology Labs uses open source software and follows an agile development approach.
--
Requirements:
--
----Highly skilled with strong experience in one or more of the following languages: Python, Ruby or Java.
----Strong experience in web technologies and frameworks such as Django, Ruby on Rails, J2EE, GWT, ...etc.
----Strong experience of the Linux/Unix operating systems.
----Strong experience in developing over Linux/Unix operating systems.
----Strong knowledge in object oriented analysis and design.
----Familiar with agile methodologies, test driven development and SCRUM.
----Well disciplined with strong communication skills and a fast learner who can adapt to a rapidly changing environment.
--
Candidates can send their resume to jobs@jodod.com with the subject of "Team Lead".
Technical project manager required for web and mobile apps.
